description: Their Tees are designed to work as hard as you do. They’re made with a stretchy organic cotton jersey fabric that moves with you and feels soft against the skin. With a pattern built around performance, these are not your average T-shirts. Instead, they are durable, performance-based products that are built to last. Plus, all their graphics use water-based inks.
name: Black Diamond BD Stripe SS Tee - Mens
